content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest actions, I tried to execute the shell command 'xdg-open https://www.miniclip.com/games/en/' to play games on the Miniclip website, but it failed due to terminal initialization issues. In the latest development, my computer returned an error message stating that the terminal type is unknown and the 'xdg-open' command failed to open the website. Additionally, you attempted to browse the same website using the 'browse_website' command to find popular games, but no information was provided."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not specify which games are the most popular on the website. However, the website is operated by Miniclip, an international digital games and entertainment company that develops, publishes, and distributes multiplayer mobile games. The company reaches over 400 million players each month and has recently acquired SYBO and its mobile game Subway Surfers. The text also highlights Miniclip's recent milestones, including exceeding four billion downloads and opening a new studio in Portugal. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.miniclip.com/)', '\\n          Our Story\\n         (https://www.miniclip.com/our-story)', '\\n          Games\\n         (https://www.miniclip.com/games)', '\\n          Web Games\\n         (https://www.miniclip.com/games/web)', '\\n          Careers\\n         (https://www.miniclip.com/careers/vacancies)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "most popular online games"}}}'}]
"""
